schema:name: Exceedance of damaging levels of nutrient nitrogen deposition in England, 2002-2004 to 2020-2022

schema:creator.schema:name: Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs

schema:isBasedOn.schema:name: Air Pollution Trends Report 2024: Critical Load and Critical Level exceedances in the UK

schema:variableMeasured: Percentage of sensitive habitats exceeding critical loads
notes:
Data are presented as 3-year moving average time periods. A 3-year moving average is used to smooth out inter-annual variability due to the influence of weather on atmospheric chemistry.
    
</br>Subsequent back casting of the data using the new methodology introduced in advance of the 2023 update has resulted in a time-series that now extends back to the 3-year period 2002 to 2004. These changes also mean that the chart presented here cannot be directly compared to charts presented in publications of this indicator prior to 2023.

columns.name: year
columns.schema:description: The year range for the data present

columns.name: value
columns.schema:description: Percentage of sensitive habitats exceeding critical loads
